subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Penn State tight end Andrew Quarless was suspended indefinitely for an unspecified violation of team rules, the sixth Nittany Lions player suspended in the off-season. Last season, Quarless was suspended by Coach Joe Paterno for the first two games after a citation by the university police for under-age drinking.
